description: This file sets up a personalized memory system for an agent using vLLM, PostgreSQL, and pgvector, including configuration, agent initialization, and interaction examples.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of interacting with memory and models.

classes.name: PostgresMemoryDb
classes.description: Handles PostgreSQL database interactions for memory storage.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Manages in-memory and persistent memory for the agent.

classes.name: vLLM
classes.description: Represents the vLLM language model used by the agent.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent’s response, optionally streaming.
